name: WHERE IS MY PHONE?
description:
Have you ever searched your whole room still couldn't find something? Have you ever accidentally discovered a "missing" item while looking for something else? In this game, you will experience the pain of not finding something and the joy of unexpected discovery.

This game was created for Global Game Jam 2021. Everything in the game was created by Ruan Hang, except the background music.

Music: No.4 Piano Journey - Esther Abrami

Among downloadable files, the first version is a better version with a timeout of 1 hour, including sound effects, special effects, and less bugs; the 48-hour version is created within 48 hours without adding special effects and sound effects.

你有没有曾经在家里翻箱倒柜却死活找不到东西的经历呢？你有没有曾经在找某样东西时意外发现曾经“遗失的”物品的经历呢？在这个游戏中你讲体会到找不见东西的痛苦和意外发现的快乐。

本游戏为Global Game Jam 2021而创作。游戏内除背景音乐外均为白斗七星创作。

音乐来源: No.4 Piano Journey - Esther Abrami

其中，第一个版本为超时1小时的完善版本，包含音效、特效，并修复了一些bug；48小时版为48小时之内创作，未添加特效和音效。

欢迎在Bilibili和微博关注白斗七星，我尽我所能带来更多游戏开发相关的内容。
